Permission.Description: It is implementation specific whether the ResponseOnEvent service is also allowed during the defaultSession.
Secured dataIdentifiers require a SecurityAccess service and therefore a non-default diagnostic session.
Secured memory areas require a SecurityAccess service and therefore a non-default diagnostic session.
A dataIdentifier can be defined dynamically in the default and non-default diagnostic session.
Secured routines require a SecurityAccess service and therefore a non-default diagnostic session. A routine that requires to be stopped actively by the client also requires a non-default session.
